context: Could you recommend any movies directed by Clint Eastwood?
Certainly! Million Dollar Baby was directed by him. He also starred in it. Great movie!
It was released in 2004. It also starred Mike Colter, Riki Lindhome, and Hilary Swank.
I love Hilary Swank. Can you suggest other movies with her in them?
resp: Sure! She starred in The Core, Boys Don't Cry, and Amelia.

context.content: "Eragon" is a fantasy adventure film based on the novel by Christopher Paolini. The story follows a young farm boy named Eragon who discovers a dragon egg, setting off a chain of events that lead to an epic battle between good and evil. The movie features intense action sequences, magical elements, and a captivating adventure as Eragon learns to harness his newfound powers and confront the forces of darkness.

That sounds really interesting! I like the idea of a young farm boy discovering a dragon egg and getting involved in an epic battle between good and evil. The intense action sequences and magical elements also sound appealing. I think this movie meets my preferences for adrenaline-pumping action, thrilling adventure, and enchanting fantasy. [END]
